events.title: GRAND OPENING GALA!
events.description:
Come celebrate Jefferson Center for the Arts' Grand Opening of the JCA Studio Theatre!

Special Musical Guests: [Beaucoup Chapeaux](http://www.beaucoupchapeaux.net).

![Beaucoup Chapeaux](beaucoup-chapeaux.jpg)

Champagne & Hors Dâ€™oeuvres at 6:30pm.
Concert begins at 7pm.
Desserts to follow.

events.title: Mount Shasta Oktoberfest
events.description:
A benefit for Jefferson Center for the Arts.
* German Beer
* Traditional Food
* Dancing
* Kids Activities
* Raffle, Games & Live Music
* Craft Vendors & More!
events.price: $10, or $25 with Souvenir Mug and Beers. (Das Kiddos are Free)
